member.name: T:OscarBrouwer.Framework.Testing.HttpContextHelper
member.summary: Can be used to create a mocked HttpContext.

member.name: M:OscarBrouwer.Framework.Testing.HttpContextHelper.SetHttpContextWithSimulatedRequest(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the HTTP context with a valid simulated request.
member.param: The host that must be associated with the session. Normally 'localhost' will suffice.
The name of the application that requires the session. Any name will do.

member.name: M:OscarBrouwer.Framework.Testing.SimulatedHttpRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.IO.TextWriter,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The virtual directory of the application.
The physical directory of the application.
The name of the page that is requested.
The query that is passed in the request.
The writer that must be used to write the output to.

member.name: M:OscarBrouwer.Framework.Testing.SimulatedHttpRequest.GetServerName
member.summary: Gets the name of the server.

member.name: M:OscarBrouwer.Framework.Testing.SimulatedHttpRequest.MapPath(System.String)
member.summary: Maps the path to a filesystem path.
